about.title: About
about.subtitle: TahOak Park Collective – Non-extractive, community-first discovery.
about.missionText1: TahOak Park Collective is a hyper-local discovery platform designed to help residents find genuinely local businesses, organizations, resources, public spaces, and key recurring community events.
about.missionText2: Rather than prioritizing "what's closest" or "highest SEO," we focus on real relationships to the neighborhood: where owners live, where activities actually happen, and who explicitly focuses on and invests in our community.
about.inclusionText: We include entities that meet our definition of "local":
about.presenceText: Physically operates in the coverage area (brick-and-mortar address, recurring pop-up location, or resident home-based service)
about.contributionText: Provides life infrastructure, social places, support/equity, or ecosystem support to the community
about.excludeText: National and regional chains are completely excluded. This is a directory for genuinely local entities that have a real connection to our neighborhoods.
about.creditsText1: TahOak Park Collective is built and maintained by
about.creditsText3: This project serves as both a community resource and a portfolio piece demonstrating product design, UX, and local hosting capabilities.
about.feedbackText: Have questions, suggestions, or want to report an issue? We'd love to hear from you.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introductionText: TahOak Park Collective ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our Platform.
privacy.entityInfoText: Business/organization details you provide when claiming or creating listings
privacy.contactInfoText: Email addresses provided for subscriptions, suggestions, or issue reports
privacy.contentText: Images, descriptions, and other content you upload
privacy.automaticallyCollectedText: IP address and browser information (for security and analytics)
privacy.usageData: Usage data through privacy-focused analytics (self-hosted Umami)
privacy.howWeUseText: We use the information we collect to:
privacy.providePlatform: Provide, maintain, and improve the Platform
privacy.processAccount: Process and manage your account and entity listings
privacy.sendUpdates: Send you email updates (if you've subscribed with double opt-in)
privacy.respond: Respond to your inquiries and requests
privacy.protect: Protect against fraudulent or unauthorized activity
privacy.subscriptionsText: We use a double opt-in process for email subscriptions. You must verify your email address before receiving updates. You can manage your preferences or unsubscribe at any time using the magic links we provide.
privacy.transactionalText: We send essential emails related to your account, entity claims, and platform notifications. These cannot be opted out of as they are necessary for Platform functionality.
privacy.analyticsText: We use a self-hosted, privacy-focused analytics tool (Umami) that does not use cookies or track personal information. We only collect aggregate data about page views and visitor patterns. No cookie banners are required.
privacy.informationSharingText: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information. We may share information:
privacy.serviceProviders: With service providers who assist in operating the Platform (e.g., email service)
privacy.requiredByLaw: When required by law or to protect our rights
privacy.publicInfo: Entity information you choose to make public (business listings are visible to all visitors)
privacy.dataSecurityText: We implement reasonable security measures to protect your information, including password hashing (bcrypt) and secure data transmission. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.
privacy.access: Access and update your account information
privacy.delete: Delete your account (contact us to request deletion)
privacy.unsubscribe: Unsubscribe from email communications (use the unsubscribe link in emails)
privacy.requestInfo: Request information about the data we hold about you
privacy.childrensPrivacyText: Our Platform is not intended for children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.
privacy.changesText: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.
